title: Runtime resumed
description: Runtime execution resumed with explicit platform states; Rumble remains PAUSED while YouTube and Twitch move forward.

title: Runtime suspended
description: Runtime development was indefinitely suspended after repeated failures to achieve a stable, deterministic ingestion baseline across external platforms.

title: Quota enforcement hardened
description: Daily quota enforcement was stabilized across platforms, consolidating the QuotaRegistry and keeping snapshot exports aligned for downstream readers.
